tooltip.kubejs.ancient_sapling: Can be used to restore aura, see the Book of Natural Aura for details
tooltip.kubejs.eyes: Obtained by using Soulscribe to kill the corresponding creature
tooltip.kubejs.market: Throw Disentangler of Mortals into the lava of the Nether to obtain
tooltip.kubejs.corrupted_shard: Throw any item into the condensed void
tooltip.kubejs.pedestal: Will not retain items after the pedestal is destroyed!
tooltip.kubejs.speed_upgrade: Install by right-clicking, and retrieve by Shift + right-clicking
tooltip.kubejs.animal_spawner: Don't stack materials! Only one creature can be summoned at a time
tooltip.kubejs.gold_fiber: Crush gold leaves on an anvil
tooltip.kubejs.token_anger: Throw a Joyful Imprint into fire
tooltip.kubejs.refined_radiance: Throw Radiant Alloy into a Beacon Beam
tooltip.kubejs.shadow_steel: Throw Radiant Alloy into the void
tooltip.kubejs.energy_transmitter: Remote transmission, outputs on all 6 sides with a stress of 6
tooltip.kubejs.end_portal_frame: Can be destroyed but will not drop any items
tooltip.kubejs.auto_table: The automatic workbench will automatically extract from the storage container above it
tooltip.kubejs.blaze_burner: Liquid can be input without a straw
tooltip.kubejs.blaze_cake: Feed Blazing Blood into the Blaze Burner to super-heat it
tooltip.kubejs.black_iron1: Placing Smoked Iron Block on a super-heated Blaze Burner will slowly form black iron ingots
tooltip.kubejs.black_iron2: Smoked Iron Block has a 10% chance of disappearing
tooltip.kubejs.mana_liquidizer3: Use the Forest Wand to adjust magic conversion
tooltip.kubejs.torcherino1: Don't accelerate too quickly,otherwise problems may occur!
tooltip.kubejs.torcherino2:
When the machine has problems,first check if there is acceleration
earby
tooltip.kubejs.condensed_void_bucket1: WarningC: ondensed Void will destroy nearby blocks!
tooltip.kubejs.condensed_void_bucket2: Touching it will have a very strong negative effect
tooltip.kubejs.entropy_reactor1: Very dangerous! Not recommended to be placed in the base!
